title: Visiting Venice Italy - what should I see?
content:
Hello,

I will be visiting Venice and its neighboring cities. Any recommendations of places I must visit? I know there are many. Please let me know of your favorites and/or secret treasures.

Thank you in advance,

M. Comacchio

author: monique
